title: Adventuring Equipment
excerpt: How equipment can help adventurers explore.
markdown:
# Adventuring Equipment

As adventurers explore, their equipment can help them in many ways. See

for rules on many items that are useful on adventures.

Reaching New Places Use a Ladder to access out-of-the-way locations or a Torch to perceive things in the dark.
Overcoming Obstacles Bypass locked doors and containers with Thieves' Tools or create hazards for pursuers with Caltrops.
Beyond the Battlefield: The items in the
sections are especially useful, but even weapons can be used for more than battle. For example, you could use a Quarterstaff to push a sinister-looking button you're reluctant to touch.
